text: Pomona is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) located within Galloway Township, in Atlantic County, New Jersey, United States.State of New Jersey Census Designated Places - BVP20 - Data as of January 1, 2020, United States Census Bureau. Accessed December 1, 2022. As of the 2020 United States Census, the CDP's population was 7,416. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey Category:Census-designated places in New Jersey
title: Pomona, New Jersey
